text:
WESTERN UNION
SACRAMENTO 21, CALIFORNIA
STATION KVIE HOTEL RALEIGH WASH. D.C.
A MILLION DOLLARS WOULD GO A LONG WAY TOWARD MAKING POSSIBLE
THOSE AIDS TO EDUCATION WHICH CAN BE AFFORDED BY EDUCATIONAL
TELEVISION. WE HAVE ALREADY TAKEN GIANT STEPS IN CALIFORNIA
TOWARD THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A PLAN FOR THE EFFECTIVE USE OF
TELEVISION IN EDUCATION. WITH SUCH ADDITIONAL MONEY WE CAN
TAKE THE NECESSARY STEPS TOWARD IMPLEMENTATION.
EDMUND G, BROWN - GOVERNOR
MAR 21 PM 1
